channel.title: Again
channel.description: I said this many times I have a netgear vegn2610 as the last hundread videos I got a no-ip and i have set the name rsps on my router but when I use my no-ip as the ip for the server it wont log in any one have a comment all of them said firewall can any one put a tutorial for this srry for my bad english

item.title: Again
item.dc:creator: @neroxx neroxx
item.description:
@neroxx wrote:

When you portforward you are supposed to use your static IP, did you do so?

Read full topic
